nodes.text: Cruise Along Books was a short series of children's storybooks published by Fun Works that came packaged with one of Galoob's Micro Machines miniature X-ray Fleet ships. Luke Skywalker's Race Against Time came with an X-wing fighter, and Han Solo's Rescue Mission came with the Millennium Falcon. Both books were labeled "A Cruise Along Book" on the front cover.

Use your very own Micro Machine to zoom alongside heroes Luke Skywalker and Han Solo as they fly important Rebel missions! Illustrated in full color, these sturdy 10-page board books are just right for young fans.
